tit.cmt: 清和天皇 Emperor SEIWA 以下天皇名、人名の読み方は、ブリタニカ国際大百科事典、広辞苑、kotobank.jpで確認。

sen.j: 清和天皇（せいわてんのう、嘉祥3年3月25日（850年5月10日） - 元慶4年12月4日（881年1月7日））は、平安時代前期の第56代天皇。
sen.e: Emperor SEIWA (May 10, 850 - January 7th, 881) was the 56th Emperor in early Heian Period.
Emperor Seiwa (May 10, 850 - January 7, 881) was the fifty-sixth Emperor (he reigned during the early Heian period).

sen.j: 後世、武門の棟梁となる清和源氏の始祖で、諱は惟仁（これひと）。
sen.e: He was the earliest ancestor of SEIWA GENJI clan who act as leader of samurai in future ages, his posthumous name was Korehito.

sen.j: 母は太政大臣藤原良房の娘、女御藤原明子 (染殿后)（めいし、あきらけいこ）。
sen.e: His mother was a high-ranking lady in the court (a wife of an emperor), FUJIWARA no Meishi, Akirakeiko (Some dono no kisaki), who was the daughter of Grand Minister FUJIWARA no Yoshifusa.

sen.j: 外祖父藤原良房の後見の元、惟喬親王を退けて皇太子となる。
sen.e: Under his maternal grandfather's supervision, after dismissing Prince Koretaka, he became Crown Prince.

sen.j: 文徳天皇の崩御に伴い、わずか9歳で即位したため、良房が外戚として政治の実権を握った。
sen.e: Emperor SEIWA succeeded to the throne after Emperor MONTOKU when he was nine years old, so Yoshifusa took actual control of the politics as Emperor's maternal relative.

sen.j: 天皇は伴善男を信頼していた為、事件を解決した良房に遠慮する形で既に貞観6年（864年）に元服していたにも関わらず、正式に摂政に任命した。
sen.e: Since the Emperor trusted TOMO no Yoshio, after Yoshifusa sorted out the incident, the Emperor officially appointed Yoshifusa as a regent to take his consideration for others, although he celebrated his coming of age in 864.
